title: Here Is How To Disable Dm-verity Warning On The OnePlus 3T
text: XDA Senior Member th3g1z has finally found a fix to disable dm-verity warning on the OnePlus 3T running Android 7.0. The fix doesnâ€™t require flashing anything; you just need to execute two simple fastboot commands to get rid of the dm-verity warning. Head over to the linked thread for more details.
